article_title: Why Criminal Intent Should be Part of Justice Reform
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

Email address

article_metadata.description: There are many reasons to distinguish between someone who knowingly violates a criminal law, and someone who unintentionally violates a law he's never heard of.
